title: President Rajapaksa declares open South Asia’s largest Fisheries harbor in Dikkowita
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Chandana Perera President Mahinda Rajapaksa declared open the Dikkowita Fisheries Harbour constructed at a cost of 850 million rupees this morning on 18 January. It is reportedly the largest fisheries harbour in South Asia situated about 10 kilo metres north of the Capital, Colombo….
